body_html:
@martinwicke, I'm trying to run the full UT in my owner docker. It seems that latest dev docker image with bazel 0.11.0 could not compile the latest master branch of tensorflow repo.

Here is my cmd and error:
1, I pull the latest dev docker image: docker pull registry.hub.docker.com/tensorflow/tensorflow:latest-devel
2, I start a docker container by: docker run -it --name=dev registry.hub.docker.com/tensorflow/tensorflow:latest-devel bash
3, git clone tensorflow; cd tensorflow; ./configure
4, bazel build //tensorflow/python/estimator:run_config_test

Then I found errors like this:
ERROR: /home/admin/lilbedwin/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl:117:1: file '@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:windows_cc_configure.bzl' does not contain symbol 'setup_vc_env_vars'
ERROR: error loading package '': Extension file 'third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl' has errors
ERROR: error loading package '': Extension file 'third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl' has errors
INFO: Elapsed time: 1.838s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (0 packages loaded)

Then I try to update the bazel version to 0.14.1, then it's working know.
I'm not sure if this is an issue.

body:
@martinwicke, I'm trying to run the full UT in my owner docker. It seems that latest dev docker image with bazel 0.11.0 could not compile the latest master branch of tensorflow repo.

Here is my cmd and error:
1, I pull the latest dev docker image: docker pull registry.hub.docker.com/tensorflow/tensorflow:latest-devel
2, I start a docker container by: docker run -it --name=dev registry.hub.docker.com/tensorflow/tensorflow:latest-devel bash
3, git clone tensorflow; cd tensorflow; ./configure
4, bazel build //tensorflow/python/estimator:run_config_test

Then I found errors like this:
ERROR: /home/admin/lilbedwin/tensorflow/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl:117:1: file '@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:windows_cc_configure.bzl' does not contain symbol 'setup_vc_env_vars'
ERROR: error loading package '': Extension file 'third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl' has errors
ERROR: error loading package '': Extension file 'third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl' has errors
INFO: Elapsed time: 1.838s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (0 packages loaded)

Then I try to update the bazel version to 0.14.1, then it's working know. 
I'm not sure if this is an issue.
